entries.s_dac635d2: I see that you don't have enough room to get the evidence you seek. Please come back when you have room.
entries.s_b8a92f09: I see. I guess there's no hurry... just come back you have more space.
entries.s_9c880546: I hope you've gone to school. We could really use more... educated folks nowadays.
entries.s_99711fbf: Again, you still don't have enough room. Come back when you do.
entries.s_7e78bf8f: Yes, can I have the evidence, please?
entries.s_7c259594: Sean Trenwell... oh yes! I remember him. Unfortunately, he was a particularly bad student. I would always catch him trying to cheat during exams. He barely graduated from the University. In fact, he could even be considered a fake. I really don't want him representing our people in this election.
entries.s_799ad811: Mmhmm--Oh really? I actually have something that might help you. I think you could use it as evidence. Yes! Here it is. I always keep the grades of my students. Here you are.
entries.s_7291fe2e: Not yet. I still need to make room.
entries.s_70145cf1: You again. I'm still quite busy, and I see you still have those papers I gave you from Mr. Trenwell's school days. How's this... you leave me to my work, and I won't ask for those back?
entries.s_656e8f97: I see that you've returned. Do you have enough room now?
entries.s_5ec23736: Oh? I could really use your help...
entries.s_5788afea: I'm in the middle of grading papers. Did you need help with something?
entries.s_3c4a2f4: I'm too busy to talk right now. I'm grading papers. You seem like you'd be interested in voting at the capitol. They're holding an election.
entries.s_36904010: I was told to talk to you about Sean Trenwell.
entries.do_not_edit: The English version of this file (sean_questn_university.stf) is automatically generated by the SwgConversationEditor.
